item.description:
If you have a desire to meet new people, are a male or female above the age of 21 and younger than 45, The Socialites of Connecticut is for you!

Who are We?
--- The Socialites of Connecticut are a bunch of friends that go out together. Our goal is to go out and have fun at many different kinds of events throughout Connecticut.

What do we do?
--- Most importantly The Socialites of Connecticut are about having fun!
--- We go to events together: Happening nightclubs, bars, the casinos, concerts, pool, the movies, sports, hiking, wine, etc ... make a suggestion! 

When do we do it?
--- We have regular meetups on a weekly basis.

Where do we do it?
--- We regularly go to New Haven and up through Hartford, as well as trips to New York City and Springfield.

How to become one of the Socialites:
--- Submit a request.
--- Actively participate! We're not going to pressure you, you'll be the one missing out on great times.
item.name: The Socialites of Connecticut
